newsitems.title: Don't worry, Apex Legends players, Respawn's putting out some updates to keep you safe after the ALGS hacks
newsitems.contents: If you’ve been worried that you might be at risk of being hacked during your regular Apex Legends matches after some pro players suddenly found themselves cheating during a recent ALGS event, there’s now some good news. newsitems.title: UPDATE: Fancy playing Apex Legends? Probably best to wait until it's clear you're not at risk of seeing through walls
newsitems.contents: Ok, you might be good at Apex Legends, but odds are you’re not good enough to be able to gaze through solid surfaces. That said, following some incidents of hackers giving pro players some competitive advantages they didn’t ask for, players are currently concerned that they might be at risk of havin...
